summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York daily activity report and lieutenant's log for August 10-11, 2019. It documents the shift where inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell, CPR was administered, and he was transported to an outside hospital. The log details routine prison operations, counts, and staffing issues leading up to the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054 found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on the morning of August 10, 2019. CPR was performed and he was transported to an outside hospital.

persons.name: Fernandez
persons.context: Inmate #86824-054 noted as being in a dry cell in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) during the log entries.

persons.name: Mutimura
persons.context: Inmate #76329-054 transferred to special housing (dry cell) on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Carreon-Macias
persons.context: Inmate #82858-198 released on bail bond on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Wiliams
persons.context: Inmate #78640-054 noted as being on suicide watch with an inmate companion on the evening of August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Felix
persons.context: Inmate #85775-054 transferred to special housing for psych observation on the evening of August 10, 2019.

persons.name: D. Medina
persons.context: Lieutenant who assumed duties as the Evening Watch Operations Lieutenant at 4:00 PM on August 10, 2019.

connections.description: Lieutenant Medina was the supervising operations officer during the shift when Epstein was found unresponsive and transported.

events.title: Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: At approximately 6:33 AM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) in the Special Housing Unit. CPR was initiated, 911 was called, and he was transported by EMS to a local hospital with CPR continuing en route.

events.title: Morning Watch Shift Log
events.description: Routine prison operations including counts, equipment checks, and noting a shortage of staff vacating the sanitation assignment. The Control Center Fire Panel was reported inoperative.

events.title: Previous Day's Operations
events.description: Log entries from August 9 show routine counts, a fire alarm system malfunction, and the transfer of inmate Mutimura to a dry cell.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (Inmate #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) in the Special Housing Unit at approximately 6:33 AM on Saturday, August 10, 2019.
CPR was performed by prison staff and continued by EMTs. Epstein was transported via ambulance to a local hospital, with CPR still in progress.
The prison log indicates operational issues including a shortage of staff vacating posts and an inoperative Control Center Fire Panel.
Epstein was reportedly on 'Psych Obs' (psychological observation) with an inmate companion, as noted in the 'Daily Sensitive Information' section preceding the incident.
